text: Nicholas Tse (also known as Tse Ting-fung, , born 29 August 1980) is a Hong Kong singer, songwriter, martial artist musician, actor and entrepreneur. Tse is a member of the Emperor Entertainment Group.EEGmusic. "EEGmusic ." Nicolas Tse profile. Retrieved on 22 April 2008. ==Early life== Tse was born at St Teresaâ€™s Hospital in Ma Tau Wai, Kowloon, He is eldest son of Actor Patrick Tse and second wife Deborah Lee, He have one sister Jennifer Tse.
